Package it.polimi.ingsw.listeners

Class IslandListener

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.listeners.IslandListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyChangeListener, EventListener
public class IslandListener extends Object implements PropertyChangeListener
IslandListener is a PropertyChangeListener that will listen an island in order to inform a specific client that an event that regard the island was fired
See Also:
  • PropertyChangeListener

    • IslandListener

      public IslandListener(RemoteView remoteView)
      Constructs an IslandListener that is associated to the specified remote view
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • propertyChange

      public void propertyChange(PropertyChangeEvent evt)
      Responds to an event fired from the island that the class is listening
      Specified by:
      propertyChange in interface PropertyChangeListener
      Parameters:
      evt - A PropertyChangeEvent object describing the event source and the property that has changed.
      See Also:
      • PropertyChangeListener.propertyChange(PropertyChangeEvent)

    • onStudentUpdate

      private void onStudentUpdate(int island, RealmType[] realmTypes, boolean isFromEntrance)
      Forwards an IslandStudentsUpdate message to inform the client that some students were added to the island
      Parameters:
      island - the id of the island
      realmTypes - the students that were added
      isFromEntrance - true if the students come the entrance of the active player, otherwise false

    • onTowerUpdate

      private void onTowerUpdate(int indexIsland, Player previousOwner, Player newOwner)
      Forwards an IslandTowerUpdate message to inform the client that the tower of the island is changed
      Parameters:
      indexIsland - the id of the island
      previousOwner - the previous owner of the island (can be null if no one previously own the island)
      newOwner - the new owner of the island

    • onIslandUnification

      private void onIslandUnification(Integer[] islandIndexes, Island island)
      Forwards an IslandUnification message to inform the client the specified islands have been unified
      Parameters:
      islandIndexes - the ids of the unified islands
      island - the new island group
